title: Rihanna’s ‘Black Panther’ Ballad, and 8 More New Songs
description: Hear tracks by Ice Spice, Iggy Pop, SZA and others.
dc:creator: Jon Pareles and Lindsay Zoladz
media:description: Rihanna’s first solo song since her album “Anti” in 2016 is a ballad from the soundtrack to “Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.”
